MyContacts
Class Contact

java.lang.Object
  MyContacts.Contact

public class Contact
extends java.lang.Object

  • This class creates object Contact and contains all methods that deals with this object.
  • Object Contact represents a simple phone contact.
  • Object Contact attributes :
  • *Last name of the contact.
  • *First name of the contact.
  • *Address of the contact.
  • *City of the contact.
  • *Phone number of the contact.

    • Author:
    Thunder Bolt

                               int limitOfInsert)

    Parameters:
